item.title: Classification
item.description: Machine Learning : Doing By Understanding – Classification This post will be about helping you understand the basics of the main machine learning task : classification. More specifically, we are going to scratch the surface of linear classification and quickly address non linear classification. I assume some basic knowledge in probability and regression. Linear Classification Wikipedia : “A classification scheme is the product of arranging things into kinds of things (classes) or into groups of classes.

item.title: What I learned from deeplearning.ai course
